colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES SLOB DPON DZE T'A RI'I ZUGS KYI RJE BTZUN BCOM LDDAN 'DAS MA GTZUG TOR RNAM PAR RGYAL MA LHA DGU'I CHO GA LA BRTEN NAS 'CHI BLU JI LTAR BYA TSUL GSAL BAR BKOD PA 'CHI BDAG GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, SBYIR DGOS DON KHYAD PAR CAN LA DPAG STE RIGS MTHUN GYI MAN NGAG RNAMS PHAN TSUN RGYAS BKAB CHO GA BRGYUD DANG GRUB CHEN DANG DAM PA TSAD LDAN NGAG GI PHYAG BZHES YID PA BZHIN, ,DO GAL CHE BA'I SKABS ZHIG LAG LEN 'DI LTAR BGYIS PAS RTEN 'BYUNG GI LEGS LAM CHE BA ZHIG BYUNG BAR BRTEN, CHOG SGRIGS KYI YI GE 'DI LTA BU BYUNG NA RANG GZHAN MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR BSAMS TE, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN KHO NAS 'TSO BA'I SNYOM LAS PA D'IRKH'A AU SA MA YA BADZRA K'IRTIS, SNGAR BKOD PA'I RNAM RGYAL MCHOD CHOGGI YAN LAG TU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN SLOB BU TSE DANG LDAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING BSTAN 'GROR SMAN PA'I BZHED DON MTHA' DAG BGEGS MED LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PA DANG, SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN BDE'I LEGS TSOGS RGYA CHEN PO RGYUN MI 'CHAD DU 'GYUR BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
